nodes.text: Erdi the Relentless was a male Sith living during or after the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

Erdi the Relentless was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic with Knights of the Eternal Throne expansion as a World Boss for Dark vs. Light system. Whenever the dark side of the Force reaches victory state on a server, Erdi the Relentless has a chance to spawn at one or more of selected locations on Coruscant, Tatooine, Alderaan, Hoth and Dromund Kaas alongside other Dark Side World Bosses. Though killing him is required for an in-game achievement, it is impossible to determine when and where his death took place.
